programme.title: It's Showtime
programme.desc: Hosted by an all-star cast, It's Showtime is a variety show unlike any other. Watch as people from all over come on stage to showcase their skills and creativity in this one-of-a-kind talent show full of fun and prizes.

programme.title: Goin' Bulilit S15
programme.desc: This comical spin-off of the 80s comedy programme Goin' Bananas is currently the Philippines' most successful children's comedy show, created and directed by one of Goin' Bananas' original stars, Bobot Mortiz.

programme.title: Lavender Fields
programme.desc: The life of a simple flower farm girl is shattered when she falls for a charming accountant, who turns out to be a married gun cartel member. Targeted for his stolen money, she loses everything she holds dear and reinvents herself to seek justice.

programme.title: Pamilya Sagrado
programme.desc: Being a prominent political clan, the Sagrados want nothing but to keep their name faultless and sacred, until a controversial incident comes their way.

programme.title: Just The Way You Are
programme.desc: A school heartthrob makes a bet with his best friend to make a nerdy transferee fall in love with him within 30 days, but things do not go according to his plan when he gets bitten by the love bug.

programme.title: TV Patrol Global Edition
programme.desc: Comprehensive and incisive, TV Patrol is the benchmark in Philippines news journalism, bringing you the most relevant news delivered by the country's best news anchors.

programme.title: Kapamilya Simbang Gabi
programme.desc: Wake up early in the morning and hear Mass right on your television screens with ABS-CBN's brightest stars serving as readers and performers.

programme.title: Gising Pilipinas Live
programme.desc: Spice up your morning with a rousing round-up of the biggest news stories and live reports from field correspondents.

programme.title: Radyo Patrol Balita
programme.desc: Radyo Patrol Balita focuses on delivering the latest news, breaking events, and important issues that matter to you.

programme.title: Gising Pilipinas Live
programme.desc: Spice up your morning with a rousing round-up of the biggest news stories and live reports from field correspondents.

programme.title: Tandem Ng Bayan
programme.desc: Tandem Ng Bayan brings you discussions on the day's top news stories, providing analysis and engaging in commentary on political as well as social issues.

programme.title: Magandang Buhay LIVE
programme.desc: Momshies Jolina Magdangal, Melai Cantiveros, and Regine Velasquez kick off the morning with good vibes as they share a chat with celebrities on topics easily relatable to Filipino families.

programme.title: Pamilya Sagrado
programme.desc: Being a prominent political clan, the Sagrados want nothing but to keep their name faultless and sacred, until a controversial incident comes their way.

programme.title: Ngayon At Kailanman
programme.desc: Eva fights to reclaim her place in the wealthy Cortes family while searching for the truth about her identity. Fate brings her together with Inno, and their love story endures family secrets, rivalry and tragedy as they discover the real meaning of forgiveness and redemption.

programme.title: Lavender Fields
programme.desc: The life of a simple flower farm girl is shattered when she falls for a charming accountant, who turns out to be a married gun cartel member. Targeted for his stolen money, she loses everything she holds dear and reinvents herself to seek justice.

programme.title: BRGY S4
programme.desc: BRGY features interesting and humorous stories about Filipinos and businesses in North America.

programme.title: It's Showtime LIVE
programme.desc: Hosted by an all-star cast, It's Showtime is a variety show unlike any other. Watch as people from all over come on stage to showcase their skills and creativity in this one-of-a-kind talent show full of fun and prizes.

programme.title: TFC Kids Zone
programme.desc: A programme block filled with animated short stories, nursery rhymes and songs, as well as Filipino language lessons, TFC Kids' Zone promises a rich treasure trove of learning and discovery that parents and their young ones will find enriching and empowering.

programme.title: Roja
programme.desc: A paradise like no other - La Playa Roja is your ultimate escape! But behind its beauty lies danger, and soon, you'll see RED. Are you ready for the fight to survive?

programme.title: FPJ's Batang Quiapo
programme.desc: A young man rises to be one of the biggest outlaws in the neighbourhood while he navigates his way in life to survive in Quiapo. Hoping to earn the affection of his parents, his feat draws him closer to the truth about his identity.

programme.title: What Lies Beneath
programme.desc: The lives of four individuals are turned upside down after they witness the murder of their friend. They band together to put the alleged killer behind bars, but years later, the imprisoned man seeks revenge, unraveling dark secrets that test their loyalty and survival.

programme.title: Good News
programme.desc: A program that rounds up the trending feel-good stories in the Philippines and offers fashion tips and affordable healthy recipes for Kapuso viewers on a budget.

programme.title: Pinoy Crime Stories
programme.desc: The show tackled real-life crimes such as murder, trafficking, and abductions through interviews and dramatizations, offering insight into investigations.

programme.title: Imbestigador
programme.desc: An investigative show highlighting societal issues like corruption, local government problems, illegal activities, poverty, disloyalty, cleanliness, education, wasted public funds, youth, and public health and safety.

programme.title: Dokumentaryo
programme.desc: A compilation of the award-winning I-Witness documentaries.

programme.desc: The noontime daily newscast that delivers the hottest news and happenings in the country.

programme.desc: A reality documentary program that features honest and unpretentious stories of simple people and takes an unfiltered look at various social issues.

programme.desc: Offers practical tips on handling household finances and earning additional income.

programme.title: Tiktoclock: Happy Hour Na
programme.desc: A game-variety show showcasing talents of Filipinos in singing, dancing and many more.

programme.title: Unica Hija
programme.desc: The tragic death of his daughter and the ensuing breakdown of his marriage leads a scientist to clone his daughter, with the hope of bringing his wife back to him. However, others take interest in his daring but morally questionable experiment, leading to his demise. Bianca, the clone, is taken in by an unsuspecting couple, and is raised as their own. Years later, the cloning is discovered. Bianca

programme.title: Cruz vs. Cruz
programme.desc: is a story of the two families of Ryan Cruz. He left his original family in the Philippines to work abroad and provide for them. During his time as an OFW, he meets a woman who lures him to marry her after she gets pregnant.

programme.title: Hating Kapatid
programme.desc: The series follows twin siblings Tyron and Belle, separated at birth and raised in vastly different worlds. When fate brings them together, their bond sparks a journey of discovery, love, and rivalry-- unaware of the truth that binds them.

programme.title: Sanggang-Dikit FR
programme.desc: Two law-enforcers, each burdened by personal loss, are forced to work together when a high-profile murder implicates an action star. Their investigation unravels a deeper conspiracy linking their own families to the crimes, testing their loyalty, trust, and pursuit of justice.

programme.title: Encantadia Chronicles: Sang'gre
programme.desc: The series is a spin-off to the Philippine television fantasy drama series, Encantadia.

programme.title: Family Feud
programme.desc: It features two families who compete to name the most popular answers to survey questions in order to win cash and prizes.

programme.title: Fast Talk with Boy Abunda
programme.desc: The latest multi-platform showbiz news and talk show on Kapuso network.

programme.desc: Gives an up-to-the minute news here and around the world.

programme.desc: The series is a spin-off to the Philippine television fantasy drama series, Encantadia.

programme.title: Tiktoclock: Happy Hour Na
programme.desc: A game-variety show showcasing talents of Filipinos in singing, dancing and many more.

programme.title: Unica Hija
programme.desc: The tragic death of his daughter and the ensuing breakdown of his marriage leads a scientist to clone his daughter, with the hope of bringing his wife back to him. However, others take interest in his daring but morally questionable experiment, leading to his demise. Bianca, the clone, is taken in by an unsuspecting couple, and is raised as their own. Years later, the cloning is discovered. Bianca

programme.title: Cruz Vs. Cruz
programme.desc: is a story of the two families of Ryan Cruz. He left his original family in the Philippines to work abroad and provide for them. During his time as an OFW, he meets a woman who lures him to marry her after she gets pregnant.

programme.title: Hating Kapatid
programme.desc: The series follows twin siblings Tyron and Belle, separated at birth and raised in vastly different worlds. When fate brings them together, their bond sparks a journey of discovery, love, and rivalry-- unaware of the truth that binds them.

programme.title: Sanggang
programme.desc: Two law-enforcers, each burdened by personal loss, are forced to work together when a high-profile murder implicates an action star. Their investigation unravels a deeper conspiracy linking their own families to the crimes, testing their loyalty, trust, and pursuit of justice.

programme.title: Encantadia Chronicles: Sang'gre
programme.desc: The series is a spin-off to the Philippine television fantasy drama series, Encantadia.

programme.title: Family Feud
programme.desc: It features two families who compete to name the most popular answers to survey questions in order to win cash and prizes

programme.title: Fast Talk With Boy Abunda
programme.desc: The latest multi-platform showbiz news and talk show on Kapuso network.

programme.title: 24 Oras
programme.desc: Gives an up-to-the minute news here and around the world.

programme.title: Encantadia Chronicles: Sang'gre
programme.desc: The series is a spin-off to the Philippine television fantasy drama series, Encantadia.

programme.title: Pbb Teens
programme.desc: The TV reality competition follows the same premise as its many foreign counterparts around the world wherein a number of Filipinos volunteered to live inside a house for a certain number of days.

programme.title: Sanggang
programme.desc: Two law-enforcers, each burdened by personal loss, are forced to work together when a high-profile murder implicates an action star. Their investigation unravels a deeper conspiracy linking their own families to the crimes, testing their loyalty, trust, and pursuit of justice.

programme.title: Saksi
programme.desc: Brings up-to-the-minute news, relentlessly delivering breaking stories and covering live reports.

programme.title: Unang Hirit
programme.desc: A news magazine show that offers humor and information from hard news to special interests segments on travel, health, housekeeping and entertainment.

programme.title: Kapuso Mo Jessica Soho
programme.desc: Features the lighter side of veteran journalist, Jessica Soho, and highlights insightful stories of a wide range of topics

programme.title: Unang Hirit
programme.desc: A news magazine show that offers humor and information from hard news to special interests segments on travel, health, housekeeping and entertainment.

programme.title: Pepito Manaloto, Tuloy Ang Kuwento
programme.desc: The continuing comedic chronicle of the life of Pepito Manaloto, a lucky multimillion lotto winner, his family, and the merry mix of neighbors and colleagues.

programme.title: Bblgang
programme.desc: A refreshing, exciting and funny show with an assortment of gags, spoofs, and comic performances.

programme.title: Unica Hija
programme.desc: The tragic death of his daughter and the ensuing breakdown of his marriage leads a scientist to clone his daughter, with the hope of bringing his wife back to him. However, others take interest in his daring but morally questionable experiment, leading to his demise. Bianca, the clone, is taken in by an unsuspecting couple, and is raised as their own. Years later, the cloning is discovered. Bianca

programme.title: Hating Kapatid
programme.desc: The series follows twin siblings Tyron and Belle, separated at birth and raised in vastly different worlds. When fate brings them together, their bond sparks a journey of discovery, love, and rivalry-- unaware of the truth that binds them.

programme.title: Cruz Vs. Cruz
programme.desc: is a story of the two families of Ryan Cruz. He left his original family in the Philippines to work abroad and provide for them. During his time as an OFW, he meets a woman who lures him to marry her after she gets pregnant.

programme.title: It's Showtime
programme.desc: 'It's Showtime' is a hit variety program that thrives on spontaneity and animated conversations.

programme.title: Hotshots (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: This is a story of adolescent boys and girls and their early experiences in life and love. How they took life’s realities and learned its lessons. Starring the country’s top singer Gary Valenciano and matinee idol Aga Mulach.

programme.title: Ang Utol Kong Hoodlum (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Behind his bad boy image, Ben (Robin Padilla) has a big heart. The modern day Robinhood collects grease money from jeepney drivers in behalf of the syndicate. He then gets a meager amount in return which he uses to feed his adoptive parents whom he loves dearly.

programme.title: I Love You 3X A Day
programme.desc: An English teacher's students always play tricks on him because of his carabao English. He meets and falls in love with a fellow teacher.

programme.title: Sa Isang Sulok Ng Pangarap
programme.desc: Alice Dixson turned in two powerful performances as the young woman forced into plastic surgery and as the wife she was made to resemble who got hold of her husband's (Ariel Rivera) money and then ran off with her lover.

programme.title: Kailan Tama Ang Mali? (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: This is a film about women in the underbelly of the city of Manila where making a living is always difficult for the poor and material things do not guarantee happiness.

programme.title: Imortal (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Imortal refers to a love so great and so enduring, it defied conventions, tragedy and even the limitations of time.

programme.title: Dalhin Mo Ako Sa Langit
programme.desc: Lani (Ynez Veneracion) is an ambitious village lass who wants to better her life. She uses her beauty towards this end and manages to worm her way into a rich family.

programme.title: Tondo, Libingan Ng Mga Siga
programme.desc: Tondo, where gangs proliferate and crime is a way of life. This is the home of Willie Cuevas, who made his living doing the dirty work for a corrupt law enforcer.

programme.title: Mga Batang Yagit
programme.desc: This tells the story of young orphans reduced to scavenging among garbage to make a living.

programme.title: Walang Matigas Na Pulis Sa Matikin Na Misis
programme.desc: Admired for his good looks and his popularity with the ladies, most people would call Bart (Bong Revilla Jr). But if there's one thing that grounds Bart, that's his fear of his wife.

programme.title: Eagle Squad (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Eight young men of different convictions, lifestyles and outlook in life banded together to become the Eagle Squad, an elite group of secret marshalls formed to counteract criminal elements in the city.

programme.title: Mauna Ka... Susunod Ako!
programme.desc: When Gerry's father Eric dies in the hands of criminal elements, he goes to his father's bestfriend Arthur for guidance.

programme.title: Where 'D' Girls 'R'
programme.desc: Rapper-comedian Andrew E and the kids from the hit TV series TGIS combined together in this merry mix-up about poor boys falling in love with rich girls, who were guarded by a very strict maiden aunt.

programme.title: Pulis Probinsya (Pat. Omar Abdullah)
programme.desc: A cop from the province gets a new assignment in the big city. He was disappointed to find out that he would be living and working in a different turf where the games played are almost always deadly.

programme.title: Like Father, Like Son (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: The box-office idols of the 60's played parents to a young crop of talented comedians in this tale about two families. The fun began when the boys decided to try out each other's lifestyles which means getting into trouble for Niño, and books and computers for Herbert.

programme.title: Ikaw
programme.desc: The song, Ikaw, is the backdrop of this touching melodrama about a young composer and the love of his life. Sharon played a doctor who always decided using her head while Ariel was a composer who put his heart into everything he did.

programme.title: Andrea, Paano Ba Ang Maging Isang Ina?
programme.desc: Two teachers find themselves on opposite sides in the fight for freedom. Nora Aunor is the woman who chose to join the rebels while her friend, Gina Alajar opted for a quiet life with her husband.

programme.title: Bokyo
programme.desc: Bokyo's parents fight all the time and neglect their son's basic needs. He leaves home despite reassurances from his alien friend, Starking, that everything will turn out for the best.

programme.title: Anabelle Huggins Story, Ruben Ablaza Tragdey
programme.desc: The abduction and rape of pretty Annabelle Huggins was one of the most sensational crimes of the 60's. The movie bit player was kidnapped by jeepney driver, Ruben Ablaza, whom many believed was obssesed with her.

programme.title: Anak Ni Boy Negro
programme.desc: Nap never knew his father, and wanting to please his mother, he never bothered to find out anything about the notorious small time hood. But in his heart, he knew he deserved more than the shanty he grew up in.

programme.title: Bakit Manipis Ang Ulap?
programme.desc: When love takes everything you have, will you still fight for it? Chanda Romero and Laurice Guillen will take you to the bitter world of love, family, betrayal and deception.

programme.title: Paano Ba Ang Mangarap? (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Lisa (Vilma Santos) and Benny (Jay Ilagan) have found their match in each other. Unfortunately, Benny dies before they get married.

programme.title: Utang Ko Sa Iyo Ang Buhay Ko
programme.desc: Action superstar Ace Vergel returns to the screen as the courageous policeman with a mission. Action-packed from beginning to end.

programme.title: Pangako Sa'yo
programme.desc: The Megastar Sharon Cuneta plays a business woman, investigated for drug smuggling by undercover agent, Bong Revilla. When suddenly, they find themselves in love with each other.
